DC CODE ยง 38-904

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The school formerly known as the M Street High School (old) shall be known as Robert Gould Shaw Junior High School.
The school formerly known as Central High School (old) and annex shall be known as Columbia Junior High School.
